plays.text: Goal scored by Martin Rucinsky assisted by Eric Boguniecki and Jeff Finley
Penalty to Al MacInnis 2 minutes for Crosschecking Alexander Frolov
Penalty to Dmitry Yushkevich 2 minutes for Holding Doug Weight
Goal scored by Cory Stillman assisted by Scott Mellanby and Pavol Demitra
Penalty to Christian Laflamme 2 minutes for High Sticking Derek Armstrong
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Derek Armstrong
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Cory Stillman
Penalty to Alexander Frolov 2 minutes for High Sticking Doug Weight
Goal scored by Zigmund Palffy assisted by Lubomir Visnovsky and Jason Allison
Penalty to Zigmund Palffy 2 minutes for Boarding Eric Boguniecki
Penalty to Doug Weight 2 minutes for Tripping Eric Belanger
